All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdaptTo
Utility methods around Sling Adaptable.
ContextAwareService
Marker interface for Context-Aware services.
ContextAwareServiceCollectionResolver<S extends ContextAwareService,D>
Resolves the best-matching context-aware service implementation.
ContextAwareServiceResolver
Resolves the best-matching context-aware service implementation.
ContextAwareServiceResolver.ResolveAllResult<S extends ContextAwareService>
Result of the ContextAwareServiceResolver.resolveAll(Class, Adaptable) method.
Escape
Encoding utility functions.
ImmutableValueMap
ValueMap that does not support changing its content.
ImmutableValueMap.Builder
Builder interface for ImmutableValueMap.
NameResourceComparator
Orders resources alphabetically by name (ascending).
PathPreprocessor
Allows to preprocess a path before matching it against the regular experessions of the context-aware services.
QueryStringBuilder
Builds a property URL-encoded query string.
RankedServices<T>
Deprecated.
Please use org.apache.sling.commons.osgi.RankedServices instead.
RankedServices.ChangeListener
Notification for changes on services list.
RequestContext
OSGi service interface for getting a sling request for the current thread.
RequestParam
Several helper methods for getting parameters from the servlet request.
RequestPath
Utility methods when for sling paths and resources.
ResourcePath
Deprecated.
Use io.wcm.wcm.commons.util.Path instead.
ResourceType
Helper methods for resource type path handling.
UnableToAdaptException
Exception is thrown if AdaptTo.notNull(org.apache.sling.api.adapter.Adaptable, java.lang.Class<T>) call was not successful.
